column5: Like right in the face? Something tells me that cop will be looking for a new job.
The last 2 sec. that cop dumps in snow bank....Made me chuckle.
That poor girl really gets it right in the face...point blank and not even any time to react. Bye bye eyebrows.
Did you know using tear gas is considered a war crime? What that cop did is disturbing to say the least.
aiming at her face with a teargas cannon isn't cool

Video says something about Russia......  This JUST happen In Quebec as well.... Just read it on the CBC....  Insane the brutality we impose on each other...  http://www.cbc.ca/m/news/topstories/quebec-city-protesters-shot-directly-with-tear-gas-1.3011873   Edit to add.... Appears these are both the same reports.... By different news agencies. One being Russia Today....  On the CBC link I provided is a raw unedited version.  I for one wish we had the balls to stand up like those in Quebec do...   G
